channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: AutoZone 周二宣布利润高于分析师预期，同时概述了扭转销售增长放缓的前景，创下历史新高。
item.description:
AutoZone a record high Tuesday after announcing profit above analysts’ estimates, while outlining its prospects for reversing slowing sales growth https://t.co/mEV1MLVj40

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 跨山输油管道扩建工程的成本将比负责该项目的加拿大政府所有公司 5 月份预计的多出约 23 亿美元
item.description:
The expansion of the Trans Mountain oil pipeline will cost about $2.3 billion more than the Canadian government-owned company running the project projected in May https://t.co/vCav2Z6WAW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美联储掉期简要定价：2024 年仅放松 75 个基点
item.description:
Fed Swaps Briefly Price Only 75 Basis Points of Easing in 2024 https://t.co/sUgLpFxm2S

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: Sixth Street Partners 的艾伦-瓦克斯曼（Alan Waxman）与 #BloombergInvest 主持人 @sonalibasak 谈及与银行合作的可能性，"我们公司就是建立在双赢的合作关系上的。
item.description:
Sixth Street Partners' Alan Waxman talks with #BloombergInvest Host @sonalibasak about the likelihood of partnering with a bank, "Our firm was built on win-win partnerships."

For more conversations like this join @BloombergLive June 25-26th in New York. https://t.co/NDubCwi2Ig pic.twitter.com/AAC7hV33sn

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) February 27, 2024

item.title: 新泽西州州长菲尔-墨菲（Phil Murphy）提议向该州最大的企业收费，以支持其陷入困境的公共交通系统
item.description:
New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy is proposing charging the state’s biggest businesses to support its struggling public transportation system https://t.co/Wcaguu9Wr3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 401(k) 百万富翁的人数已接近历史最高水平。
item.description:
The number of 401(k) millionaires is within striking distance of an all-time high. https://t.co/7CWt6NkbvA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 周二，南方水务公司（Southern Water）承认污水泄漏导致英格兰南唐斯国家公园（South Downs National Park）边缘的数千条鱼类死亡，并被处以 33 万英镑的罚款。
item.description:
Southern Water was fined £330,000 on Tuesday after admitting a raw sewage spill that killed thousands of fish on the edge of England’s South Downs National Park https://t.co/yDJ6WzxD1P

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 工党表示，为了成功脱欧，工党将把英国打造成 "更具竞争力、更加开放的经济体"，并与欧盟规则保持有节制的分歧。
item.description:
To make a success of Brexit, Labour says it would turn the UK into "a more competitive and open economy" with managed divergence from EU rules https://t.co/iad9CHfzQ2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 印度在世界贸易组织会议上捍卫本国为确保粮食安全和就业而提供的农业和渔业援助
item.description:
India arrived at meetings of the World Trade Organization defending agricultural and fishing assistance that the country provides to ensure food security and jobs https://t.co/eKOIqD2inf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 对许多人来说，2 月 29 日只是又一天。但对有些人来说，闰日可能意味着多赚一点钱
item.description:
For many, February 29 is just another day. But for some, leap day could mean a little extra cash https://t.co/d6YIJTOEPh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 资深能源投资商哈格-谢尔曼（Haag Sherman）表示，雪佛龙公司本应预料到埃克森公司有能力破坏对圭亚那巨型油田股份的收购，这一障碍有可能使这项价值 530 亿美元的收购计划泡汤。
item.description:
Chevron should have anticipated Exxon’s ability to derail a takeover of a massive oilfield stake in Guyana, a snag that threatens to unravel a $53 billion acquisition, said veteran energy investor Haag Sherman. https://t.co/uZmao9meVt

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 高盛集团首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）表示，消费者支出的疲软使人们对美国经济将避免衰退的预期产生了怀疑。
item.description:
Goldman Sachs Chief Executive Officer David Solomon said softer spending by consumers calls into question expectations that the US economy will avoid a recession. https://t.co/aUbuf7QhTA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: Capital One 预测，解决 Discover Financial Service 的监管难题所需的时间和费用将达到预期的上限，甚至超出预期。
item.description:
Capital One predicted the time and expenses needed to fix Discover Financial Service’s regulatory challenges will be at the high end of what’s expected, or even beyond. https://t.co/FFa8GfmZva

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 一名从加密货币交易所 Bitfinex 洗劫了数十亿美元的黑客披露了他如何完成史上最大比特币抢劫案之一的细节。
item.description:
A hacker who looted billions of dollars from crypto exchange Bitfinex revealed details of how he was able to pull off one of largest Bitcoin heists in history. https://t.co/2Jg8X9qvBn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）重申了她的预期，即在利率维持在当前水平的情况下，通胀率将继续进一步下降，但她表示现在开始降息还为时过早。
item.description:
Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman repeated her expectation that inflation will continue to decline further with interest rates held at their current level, but said it’s too soon to begin rate cuts. https://t.co/bCbdGb5PWI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 即使在人工智能大行其道的当下，交易员们仍将数十亿资金投入到一个久经考验的 ETF 基金中，该基金只购买提供健康现金流的公司。
item.description:
Even with all the AI euphoria, traders are pouring billions into a tried-and-tested ETF that simply buys companies offering healthy cash flows https://t.co/8XbiGR6Q3M

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，瑞典金融科技公司 Klarna 正在向银行征求意见，计划最快于第三季度在美国进行 200 亿美元的首次公开募股（IPO）。
item.description:
Swedish fintech Klarna is sounding out banks for a $20 billion US IPO as soon as the third quarter, sources say https://t.co/uI42K4LT2n

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行和新斯科舍银行的盈利因消费者和企业在严峻的经济形势下日益紧缩的现金而受到影响
item.description:
Earnings at Bank of Montreal and Bank of Nova Scotia were marred by increasingly cash-strapped consumers and businesses amid a challenging economic landscape https://t.co/NiVe6vYaqY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 总部位于伦敦的仓库开发商 Segro 希望通过出售新股筹集多达 8 亿英镑（10 亿美元）的资金
item.description:
London-based warehouse developer Segro is looking to raise as much as £800 million ($1 billion) by selling new shares https://t.co/6m1OfmCn2Y

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团（LVMH）正在洽谈从媒体集团拉加代尔（Lagardere）手中收购法国时尚杂志《巴黎竞赛》（Paris Match）。
item.description:
Luxury giant LVMH is in talks to buy French glossy magazine Paris Match from media conglomerate Lagardere https://t.co/HnYRhbwKIr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 作为运动员，赚取十亿美元从未如此容易。
item.description:
It's never been easier to make a billion dollars as an athlete. https://t.co/qXk8L8WEHx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 英国金融科技平台 PrimaryBid 计划裁员约 25%，原因是交易量下滑
item.description:
UK fintech platform PrimaryBid plans to cut about 25% of staff amid a slump in dealmaking https://t.co/OSWVEOrBC3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 德意志银行希望员工从 6 月起每周工作三天，但工会称这一政策变化面临 "巨大阻力"。
item.description:
Deutsche Bank wants staff back in the office three days a week from June, but unions say there is "enormous resistance" to the policy change https://t.co/c1Zsn7WPxy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 荷兰芯片设备制造商 ASM 继续受益于中国需求，季度收入超出预期
item.description:
Dutch chip-equipment maker ASM continued to benefit from Chinese demand with quarterly revenue topping estimates https://t.co/0SpE3fLEdU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 八达通首席执行官表示，即使在能源价格降低的情况下，英国能源账单欠供应商的债务仍在增加
item.description:
Debt owed to suppliers on UK energy bills is growing even with lower energy prices, says the CEO of Octopus https://t.co/seWbXAWuck

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 拜登向国会领导人施压，要求避免政府部分关门，因为他们聚集在白宫，达成协议的时间已经不多了
item.description:
Biden presses congressional leaders to avoid a partial government shutdown, as they gathered at the White House with time running out to reach a deal https://t.co/SCSINBIaiT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 阿波罗首席执行官马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）说，最好的投资者都在新加坡和阿联酋等地运作，他认为美国的机构已经过于注重基准了
item.description:
Apollo CEO Marc Rowan said the best investors operate in places such as Singapore and the United Arab Emirates, contending US institutions have become too focused on benchmarks https://t.co/jFVae9jCI3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 哈维尔-米莱伊总统的总统令在参议院遭到越来越多的反对，导致该总统令有可能在下周的例行会议上被推翻。
item.description:
Growing opposition to President Javier Milei’s presidential decree in the Senate puts it at risk of being overturned as regular sessions get underway next week https://t.co/mgb4pBstB1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在下周的财政预算案中，英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）必须在增加税收与经济增长之间取得平衡。另外：Shein 在伦敦上市的潜在 "毒杯"。与@h_chandlerwilde一起获取最新消息
item.description:
With the Budget next week, UK Chancellor Jeremy Hunt must balance the need to raise tax revenues with growing the economy. Plus: the potential "poison chalice" of Shein listing in London. Get The Readout with @h_chandlerwilde https://t.co/RjJVVL9pFw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚积极提高利率并承诺走出目前的 "困境"，为恢复人们对遭受重创的奈拉的信心迈出了重要一步
item.description:
Nigeria took a vital step toward restoring confidence in the battered naira by aggressively raising rates and pledging to dig the country out of its present "mess" https://t.co/1l8qel6IJp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024
